description: Cryptolens is a Software Licensing as a Service (SLaaS) platform that provides developers with tools to manage software licenses, protect against piracy, and analyze usage data.

actions.name: addCustomer
actions.description: Add a new customer to your Cryptolens account

actions.name: blockKey
actions.description: Block a license key to prevent it from being accessible by most Web API methods

actions.name: createKey
actions.description: Create a new license key for a product

actions.name: extendLicense
actions.description: Extend a license key by a specified number of days

triggers.name: newApiEvent
triggers.description: Trigger when a new API event is logged (activation, deactivation, key creation, etc.)
